Package model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a game. This class was initially intended to be saved in a Json file and used to save the progression of the game This is only in charge of the players, the deck and the board, not of the animations (except for a part of the movement of player) and not of the conduct of the game itself.
    Author:
    Martin

                  throws exceptions.AlreadyPresentException

        Parameters:

        number - The number of the Player
        Returns:

      • movePlayer

                                               Player p)

        Parameters:
        next - The number of square you need to move
        p - The Player that need to move
        Returns:
